BUILD WITH IT: LAPIS!与之搭建:青金石
A true blue building buddy
一个”真蓝”的建筑伙伴
注：双关语,true blue指的是忠诚的

Get ready to treasure lapis – a gem of a block designed to brighten up your builds in this week’s Build with It! Lapis is perfect for building. In fact, that’s one of its primary functions in Minecraft. Use the block to build your creations, or do a little crafting to dye other items a brilliant and bold blue. With lapis, the potential is only limited by the amount of materials you can store (like this treasure chest inspired build by Kimandjax)! 准备好收藏青金石－一个建造中的点缀，用来在本周的与中建造中照亮你的建筑，青金石在建筑上是完美的，事实上，这是他在我的世界里的主要功能之一，你可以用青金石块来建造你的作品，或者通过合成来把其他物品染成明亮而突出的蓝色，有了青金石，潜力只会受到你能存储多少材料的限制
(例如这个由Kimandjax设计的宝箱)

A dazzling rooftop by DiamondBack662

You could take a more subtle approach as well because we know the bright blue may not fit the rest of your design dreams. Still, if you’re dreaming of some sparkly ways to break up your stone builds, try using the ore inside your build as an accent like TommyPusherMC has done here below. 当然你也可以采用更巧妙的办法，因为我们知道明亮的蓝色可能不适合你其他的建筑想法，不过如果你想用一些闪闪发光的办法来打破你的石头建筑，你可以尝试在你的建筑里面使用矿石来作为突出点,就像TommyPusherMC在下面做的一样





file_1596527715000.jpg (50.58 KB, 下载次数: 0)

Make more with your ore，as illustrated by TommyPusherMC
用你的矿石来制造更多，就像TommyPusherMC的这个的图片展示的一样

Lapis can be used in all kinds of builds that need a blue hue. A tried and true style, you could use it within classic magic and fantasy castles or perhaps to represent a detour to the stars and beyond with a sci-fi motif. Don’t feel like building underwater with some of our more recent Build With It suggestions like prismarine and coral? Why not pay homage to your aquatic-themed dreams on land by using lapis to represent the ocean?青金石可以在各种需要蓝色.色调的建筑上使用，这是一种久经考验的风格,你可以在典型的魔法和幻想城堡里使用它，或者是一条科幻主题的通往星星或者更远的迂回之路，不觉得我们很多最新的与之建造例如珊瑚和海晶石都建造在水下吗？为什么不在陆地上通过用青金石来代表海洋来向你的水上主题梦想致敬呢？
Grab your mining gear, clear up your inventory space, and spend some time collecting as much lapis as you can carry because after you’ve stocked up, get ready to rock this block in all kinds of ways. We’ve included a few of these stylish community builds we received to help provide some inspiration.拿起你的工具，清理你的库存，然后花时间多收集点青金石，因为在你库存充足之后，你就可以准备好用各种各样的办法来使用这种方块，我们在这里提供了一些我们收到的社区时尚建筑，来提供一些启发
